CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "John Boy"),"jboy@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Jennifer Spencer"),"Jspencer@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Debbie Boncek"),"DBoncek@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Lori Chester"),"lchester@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Steve Maurer"),"smaurer@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Heather Rosenow"),"HRosenow@ges.com", ""))))))
CustomField.label: GES AE Email
